mapper.insert: insert into disabled(dno, memail, dreason, ddate) values (SEQ_DISABLED_DNO.nextval, #{memail}, #{dreason}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT dno, memail, dreason, ddate, mmyimage, mnickname FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, dno, d.memail, dreason, ddate, m.mmyimage, m.mnickname FROM disabled d, member m WHERE d.memail = m.memail and rownum <=#{endRowNo}) WHERE rnum >=#{startRowNo}
